entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Alma
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
